graph_title: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
indicator_name: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
SDG_GOAL: Goal 6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 6.b: Support and strengthen the participation of local communities in improving water and sanitation management
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 6.b.1: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator assesses the percentage of local administrative units (as defined by the national government) that have an established and operational mechanism by which individuals and communities can meaningfully contribute to decisions and directions about water and sanitation management.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 6.b: Support and strengthen the participation of local communities in improving water and sanitation management
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 6.b.1: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
un_custodian_agency: World Health Organisation (WHO), UN Environment (UNEP), Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)

fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 6.b : Appuyer et renforcer la participation de la population locale à l’amélioration de la gestion de l’eau et de l’assainissement
